reviews.review:
заебывает пиздец,убить время с другом?
почемунет!
Buen juego, entretenido y con una buena historia, recomendado para que lo jueguen.
good but not as good as portal 1

Dark Humor Sci-Fi Puzzle game. Very Fun.
    One minor note of negativity: Best played in intervals. Not the kind of game I could play all day at least. It's not because it isn't amazing, I applaud that it challenges you to think in creative ways using theoretical physics. It's just that too many turret shots to the face in too short a time span, or simply playing too long at once makes me nauseated. Something about the red screen glare and/or the graphics used probably. The old DOS graphics had a way of doing that to me, maybe it's tangentially related. The game still kicks butt either way
    Advanced AI being evil, backstory on Chell and Glados and a wormhole of comic relief added to the game makes a recipe for an even more delicious cake. What more could you want?
Es un cago de risa, y constantemente te esta forreando con cualquier cosa que hagas la robot esta que no me acuerdo como se llama, recomenda3
This game isnt about why its about why not
Frickin awesome and funny!! good story as well  ties in with half life

Trudniejszy i bardziej rozbudowany od swojego poprzednika, co tylko urozmaica rozgrywkę. Graficznie gra prezentuje się bardzo dobrze. Fabuła jest też na wysokim poziomie. Polecam grę wszystkim, którzy czują niedosyt po pierwszej części oraz tym którzy dopiero rozpoczynają swoją drogę z Portalem. Czekam na część 3.

The cake is a lie
really cool would love to see a school course based off of portal creation
Amazing game! There will be nothing like this game!!

Honestly one of the best games I have ever ever played. The story is done naturally and without exposition dumps, control is next to never taken away from me, and I am allowed to take the game where I want to. Even if the ending is fixed, the game feels amazing. The puzzles are challenging and make me use my brain, which kinda hurt (Chamber 19), but the game was great. There are games which cost $60-120 which are actually worth literally nothing, while this game should require you to saw off your legs to play. But I got this and Portal 1 for $2 total. I love valve!

Mecanicas originales, humor.
Este juego es una obra de arte
Крутая игра наиграл всего 12 часов но игра топ особенно босс.
В кооперативном прохождении с другом - идеально.

игра прикольная кто проходил первый портал тому легче проходить если играть с другом который играет в первый раз то ему будет не интересно играть потому что ты будешь ему указывать как делать а если не указывать твои нервы не выдержут и ты всеравно  подскажешь как проходить уровень      а так игра норм

Uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado. Historia fantástica, puzzles difíciles, pero nunca te llegas a atascar y gráficos que se siguen viendo bien incluso hoy en día. Supera en todo al original, y mira que es difícil
I've played for more than 11 hours, try about 300+H, I love this game.
game good, puzzle fun, linear level design good, character joke and story good.
Probably my favorite game of all time. It is a totally immersive and challenging puzzle game with characters and plot that will captivate you through every moment of gameplay.

its an extremely fun puzzle game with an thrilling story. would recommend playing portal 1 first, but its not necessery to still enjoy it
Facil de jugar, con una historia interesante y varios detalles visibles y ocultos que la vuelven genial.
A cute little game with great story. Those of you like me who has neglected it for all these years, go ahead and play it! :)

This game is surprisingly replayable, despite being a roughly 2 hour long puzzle game. i used to play portal 2 nonstop for hours on the xbox 360 version, and that was without mods or co-op (fuck xbox live and i have no friends). the pc version on top of co-op and a great singleplayer, has 3 high quality mods avalable for download directly through steam, an easy to use level editor, and by extension, an unlimited supply of puzzles to solve! definitely worth the price.
Классная играя очень развевает, и затягивает.
great game. lots of fun for one or two players

Сложилось мнение, что все игры от валв лютый кал. Я приятно удивлен что Portal не таакая (возможно из-за того что тут нет компендиумов и операций... ну вы поняли). Да и в целом игра стимулирует думать
Очень хорошая игра-головоломка, cюжет очень захватавающий! Рекомендую можете брать!
É um exelente jogo de estratégia, muito divertido solo, e perfeito no multiplayer onde a diversão realmente aparece
